name: Basket Island Demo
overview: A demo of Basket Island by French demo makers, Syndrome, made an appearance on the cover disk of Amiga Dream magazine in December 1996 (issue 35), accompanied by a brief preview article. It’s a cutesy arcade basketball game that was destined for a PC as well as AGA Amiga release. It was never completed so we’ll just have to be grateful for the demo and imagine what might have been.
